subject: Commission payment date
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team
I have been participating in Simsonn affiliate program for a while, and
have made some conversions.
I would like to ask when will I receive my payment?
Regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi THUMMO,    We will disburse the previous month's commission at the beginning of each month. As we are in a long holiday period during early October, the commissions for September and October will be settled together in early November.
